snippet: If the companies do not reach an agreement before April 8, Justice Jeffrey K. Oing of New York State Supreme Court will continue hearing the case.
abstract: Jeffrey K Oing, judge overseeing lawsuit brought by Macy's against J C Penny and Martha Stuart Living Omnimedia, will send parties into meditation following three weeks of testimony.
lead_paragraph: If the companies do not reach an agreement before April 8, Justice Jeffrey K. Oing of New York State Supreme Court will continue hearing the case.

headline.seo: Macy’s, J.C. Penney and Martha Stewart Living Omnimedia Ordered Into Mediation
headline.main: Justice Orders Mediation in Martha Stewart Case
headline.print_headline: Justice Orders Mediation In Martha Stewart Case
